original_text: So you see how God accepts someone as right with himself. That person must not only believe in God. He must also do good things to show that he has faith.
korean_text: 이로 보건대 사람이 행함으로 의롭다 하심을 받고 믿음으로만은 아니니라

sentences.original_text: So you see how God accepts someone
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 하나님이 어떻게 사람을 받으시는지 봅니다

sentences.original_text: That person must not only believe in God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 하나님을 믿을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: He must also do good things
to show that he has faith
